name: BIRD HERO (BebekOrginal)
description:
In the game, we play as little pigeon that need to avoid close meetings with angry hawks. To defence, he uses a built in him gun, and low intelligence of enemies - they can kill each other.

The game was created for Mini Jam 99: Birds. Limitation - "Can't stop moving". Our enemies never stop moving (meybe when they dead), and we shouldn't stop moving to avoid damage.

Controls:

Mouse - our Pigeon follows cursor;

LMB/Space - our living gun shoots;

Dont look at this text bellow xD
